subSubSection.paragraph: Measurements. BL: 5.8–6.9 mm , FL: 3.1–3.5 mm . HW: 1.12–1.23 mm , PL: 0.88–0.96 mm , PW: 0.83–0.92 mm , EL: 1.44–1.61 mm , EW: 1.27–1.43 mm , SL: 1.24–1.39 mm . Head 0.83–0.91 times as wide as elytra; Pronotum 1.02–1.11 times as long as wide; Elytra 1.09–1.17 times as long as wide.
Distribution. China ( Hongkong , Zhejiang, Jiangxi, Fujian, Guangxi.); Vietnam . New to Zhejiang, Jiangxi, Fujian, Guangxi.

Variability. The coloration of the metalic area of elytra is varied from brassy to coppery. The size of the metalic area of elytra is as
Fig. 24
in most specimens. In rare cases, it can be enlarged as in Fig. 3.
